properties.areaDesc: Moody; Brookings; Kingsbury; Miner; Beadle; Lake
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 3:37AM CST until February 9 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
2 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds
gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of east central South Dakota.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Given the banded nature of the expected
snowfall, small shifts in the storm track could result in
additional changes to expected snowfall as well as drastic
variations in snow amounts over short distances.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY
